input-page-subtitle: Analyze in depth the SEO of a web page
seo-score-desc: The speed of your page is {{score}}% of optimal.
website-perview-desc: Here the last preview generated by
web-vitals-desc-title: Key Insights on Website Performance Metrics
web-vitals-desc: These data, when combined, offer a deep insight into your website's performance. They help gauge how quickly users view critical content (LCP), server response time, and the stability of page layout (CLS).
lcp-desc: Largest Contentful Paint marks the time at which the largest text or image is painted.
cls-desc: Cumulative Layout Shift measures the movement of visible elements within the viewport.
si-desc: Speed Index shows how quickly the contents of a page are visibly populated.
fcp-desc: First Contentful Paint marks the time at which the first text or image is painted.
ti-desc: Time to Interactive is the amount of time it takes for the page to become fully interactive.
tbt-desc: Sum of all time periods between FCP and Time to Interactive, when task length exceeded 50ms, expressed in milliseconds.
